actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to assist younger farmers to obtain real estate loans more easily under such act.

summary.text: Young Farmers Investment Act - Authorizes the Secretary of Ariculture to make direct loans under the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to persons acquiring and improving owner-operated farms up to the present market value of the farm. Sets forth limitations on the amount, interest rate, and period of time for such loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Consolidated Farm and Rural Development Act to assist younger farmers to obtain real estate loans more easily under such act.
